rules_text: Finale of Cinders deals 2 damage to any target. For each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard, you may pay {R}. Whenever you do, Finale of Cinders deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
[i]“How fitting was it, that the father of fire would also be its first victim.”
—Azamir, “The First Flame”[/i]
